%3A%2F%2Fcrystallizedskins.s3.amazonaws.com%2Frobertseidel.obj"%2C"model_local"%3A"3d%2Fbanzbowinkel.obj"%2C"image"%3A"assets%2Fartists%2F11.png"%2C"piece_name"%3A"Metafurnish"%2C"year"%3A"2013"%7D%2C%7B"id"%3A"11"%2C"artist_name"%3A"Julien%20Simshauser"%2C"video_url"%3A"https%3A%2F%2Fvimeo.com%2F24543915"%2C"url"%3A"http%3A%2F%2Fjuliensimshauser.com"%2C"model"%3A"http%3A%2F%2Fcrystallizedskins.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fyvesnetzhammer.obj"%2C"model_local"%3A"3d%2Fjuliensimshauser.obj"%2C"image"%3A"assets%2Fartists%2F12.png"%2C"piece_name"%3A"Picture%20of%20Life"%2C"year"%3A"2011"%7D%2C%7B"id"%3A"12"%2C"artist_name"%3A"Robert%20Seidel"%2C"video_url"%3A"https%3A%2F%2Fvimeo.com%2F2669327"%2C"url"%3A"http%3A%2F%2Fwww.robertseidel.com"%2C"model"%3A"http%3A%2F%2Fcrystallizedskins.s3.amazonaws.com%2Fzeitguised.obj"%2C"model_local"%3A"3d%2Frobertseidel.obj"%2C"image"%3A"assets%2Fartists%2F13.png"%2C"piece_name"%3A"_grau"%2C"year"%3A"2004"%7D%5D%2C"general-copy"%3A%5B%7B"label"%3A"sub_header"%2C"copy"%3A"The%20Wrong"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"title"%2C"copy"%3A"Crystallized%20Skins"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"launch_button"%2C"copy"%3A"Launch%20Digital%20Pavillion"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"mobile_fallback"%2C"copy"%3A"Better%20experienced%20on%20a%20desktop"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"about_label"%2C"copy"%3A"Concept"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"about_sumup"%2C"copy"%3A"<span>An%20online%20collection%20of%203d%20objects%20<br>%20by%2013%20international%20video%20artists%2C<br>%20<a%20href%3D%5C"%23%5C">available%20for%20download.<%2Fa><%2Fspan>"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"about_copy"%2C"copy"%3A"<p>The%20pavilion%20<b>Crystallized%20Skins<%2Fb>%20is%20conceived%20in%20the%20tradition%20of%20plaster%20cast%20collections%20of%20the%2018th%20and%2019th%20century.%20European%20museums%20in%20that%20period%2C%20for%20example%20<i>The%20South%20Kensington%20Museum<%2Fi>%2C%20today%20known%20as%20<i>Victoria%20and%20Albert%20Museum<%2Fi>%2C%20started%20to%20collect%20a%20wide%20array%20of%20reproductions%20of%20Classical%2C%20Baroque%20and%20Renaissance%20masterpieces%20for%20artists%2C%20students%20and%20historians%20to%20experience%20an%20actual%20physical%20object%20and%20understand%20the%20aesthetic%20knowledge%20of%20the%20specific%20epoch.<%2Fp>%5Cn<p>Many%20of%20these%20collections%20were%20broken%20up%20or%20disappeared%20in%20storage%20during%20the%20first%20half%20of%20the%2020th%20century%2C%20when%20the%20value%20of%20the%20casts%20was%20questioned.%20But%20now%2C%20in%20our%20digital%20age%2C%20a%20generation%20exists%20that%20is%20surrounded%20by%20copies%2C%20appropriations%20and%20remixes%20without%20questioning%20the%20origin%20of%20an%20idea.%20So%20this%20collection%20of%20virtual%20objects%20is%20extending%20upon%20the%20historic%20trajectory%20of%20the%20physical%20libraries%2C%20spanning%20an%20artistic%20heritage%20of%20centuries.<%2Fp>%5Cn<p>To%20unify%20the%20appearance%20of%20the%20virtual%20sculptures%2C%20they%20are%20reduced%20to%20the%20pure%20three-dimensional%20object%20and%20its%20underlying%20mesh%20structure%2C%20frozen%20in%20a%20compelling%20posture%20and%20excluding%20any%20animation%20or%20texture.%20Very%20much%20like%20the%20classical%20plaster%20casts%2C%20this%20allows%20for%20focusing%20on%20the%20construction%20of%20sculptural%20form%20and%20curvature%20details%2C%20as%20well%20as%20the%20overall%20composition.<%2Fp>%5Cn<p>These%20virtual%20sculptures%20have%20been%20three-dimensional%20in%20the%20conceptual%20phase%20as%20well%20as%20in%20the%20making%20process%2C%20but%20have%20been%20flattened%20into%20the%20rectangular%20frame%20of%20the%20final%20film%20sequence.%20Opposing%20them%20with%20the%20resulting%20experimental%20film%2C%20new%20ways%20of%20experiencing%20and%20understanding%20are%20made%20possible.%20For%20the%20future%2C%20the%20collection%20holds%20the%20potential%20to%20be%20extended%20with%20other%20film-object-constellations%20or%20even%20to%20reappear%20in%20the%20physical%20world%20with%20the%20help%20of%203d-printing%20technology.<%2Fp><p>All%20objects%20of%20the%20Crystallized%20Skins%20pavilion%20are%20provided%20by%20the%20artists%20under%20a%20<b>NonCommercial%20Creative%20Commons<%2Fb>%20license%20for%20download.%20Resulting%20remixes%20and%20artworks%20should%20be%20published%20under%20<b>%23crystallizedskins<%2Fb>.%20<%2Fp>"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"watch_film_button"%2C"copy"%3A"Watch%20the%20Film"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"explore_button"%2C"copy"%3A"Explore%20the%20Skin"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"credits"%2C"copy"%3A"<p><a%20href%3D%5C"http%3A%2F%2Fwww.robertseidel.com%5C"%20target%3D%5C"_blank%5C">Curated%20by%20Robert%20Seidel<%2Fa><%2Fp><p><a%20href%3D%5C"http%3A%2F%2Ffluuu.id%5C"%20target%3D%5C"_blank%5C">Development%20by%20FLUUUID%26mdash%3BSilvio%20Paganini<%2Fa><%2Fp><p><a%20href%3D%5C"http%3A%2F%2Fbuilders-club.com%5C"%20target%3D%5C"_blank%5C">Design%20by%20Builders%20Club%26mdash%3BJulien%20Simhauser<%2Fa><%2Fp><p><a%20href%3D%5C"http%3A%2F%2Fvonsallwitz.com%5C"%20target%3D%5C"_blank%5C">Sound%20by%20Nikolai%20von%20Sallwitz<%2Fa><%2Fp>%5Cn"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"below_credits"%2C"copy"%3A"<a%20href%3D%5C"http%3A%2F%2Fthewrong.org%2F%5C"%20target%3D%5C"_blank%5C">Pavilion%20of%20The%20Wrong%26mdash%3BNew%20Digital%20Art%20Biennale%26mdash%3BNovember%201st%2C%202015%20to%20January%2031st%202016<br><%2Fa>"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"artists_title"%2C"copy"%3A"Featured%20Works"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"new_window"%2C"copy"%3A"opens%20in%20a%20new%20window"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"download_button"%2C"copy"%3A"Download%20all%20the%203D%20Models%20(110MB)"%7D%2C%7B"label"%3A"down_read_the_concept"%2C"copy"%3A"Read%20the%20concept"%7D%5D%7D
